data.title: Air line, driving route, midpoint
data.meta_description: Shows the distance in kilometres between Silapathar and Rosario and displays the route on an interactive map. Worldwide distance calculator with air line, route planner, travel duration and flight distances.
data.text:
Flight route: 10,789.51 mi (17,364.03 km) (20h 55min)

The flight distance between the nearest airports Silapathar (DAC) and Rosario (EZE) is 10,789.51 mi (17,364.03 km). This corresponds to an approximate flight time of 20h 55min. Similar flight routes: DAC → MVD , DAC → SCL , DAC → FLN , DAC → CWB , MDL → EZE

Bearing: 247.72° (WSW)

The initial bearing on the course from Silapathar to Rosario is 247.72° and the compass direction is WSW.

Midpoint: -12.28688,24.16385

The geographic midpoint between Silapathar and Rosario is in 5,463.14 mi (8,792.07 km) distance between both points in a bearing of 247.72°. It is located in Zambia, North-Western Province.

Distance: 10,926.28 mi (17,584.15 km)

The shortest distance (air line) between Silapathar and Rosario is 10,926.28 mi (17,584.15 km).

Driving route: -- ( - )

The shortest route between Silapathar and Rosario is according to the route planner. The driving time is approx. . Half of the trip is reached in .

Time difference: -8.5h

The time difference between Silapathar (Asia/Kolkata) and Rosario (America/Argentina/Cordoba) is -8.5 hours. This means that it is now 15:52 (10.08.2024) in Silapathar and 07:22 (10.08.2024) in Rosario.
